categories: Category:Military personnel of the Sith Empire

nodes.text: Krallo, known by her nickname "The Party", was a female Human who served the reconstituted Sith Empire during the Cold War with the Galactic Republic. She was stationed aboard Vaiken Spacedock.
"The Party" Krallo appears in the video game Star Wars: The Old Republic, released by BioWare in 2011, as the Social Items vendor for Imperial players on Vaiken Spacedock.
